short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 2017 Chrome Extension. Allows Zooming, clipboard delegate for cke,screenshots,close download tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: 2017 Chrome Extension. Allows Isometric Zooming, clipboard delegate for ckeditor, screenshots of current tab, auto close download tab when it appears, SP3/SP4 detection.
